testsuite.name: org.spekframework.spek2.BabysitterServiceFeature

testcase.name: When: A babysitter enters their start time before 5PM
Then: it should throw invalid time error
When: A babysitter enters their end time after 4AM
Then: it should throw invalid time error
When: A babysitter enters the bed time before their start time
Then: it should throw invalid time error
When: A babysitter enters an end time before midnight
Then: it should throw invalid time error
When: A babysitter enters a valid time
Then: it should be valid input
Then: it should create a valid work day
Then: it should calculate the correct pay

testsuite.system-out:
Invalid input. All hours must be numeric and bed time must be after start time. Start Time (17-23) = 16 Bed Time (18-24) = 20 End Time (00-04) = 2
Invalid input. All hours must be numeric and bed time must be after start time. Start Time (17-23) = 17 Bed Time (18-24) = 20 End Time (00-04) = 5
Invalid input. All hours must be numeric and bed time must be after start time. Start Time (17-23) = 20 Bed Time (18-24) = 19 End Time (00-04) = 2
Invalid input. All hours must be numeric and bed time must be after start time. Start Time (17-23) = 17 Bed Time (18-24) = 19 End Time (00-04) = 22
Converted start hour: 0 Converted bed hour: 3 Converted end hour: 9 Converted start time: 00:00 Converted bed time: 03:00 Converted end time: 09:00 100.0
